str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
A thing done, a deed, action; a matter, an affair. From prasso; a deed; by implication, an affair; by extension, an object.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Plural

str2: Of persons: incapable; of things: impossible; either the inability, or that which is impossible. Passively, impossible.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
To deceive, lie, speak falsely. Middle voice of an apparently primary verb; to utter an untruth or attempt to deceive by falsehood.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From kata and pheugo; to flee down.
From kratos; to use strength, i.e. Seize or retain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Feminine Singular
str2: From pro and keimai; to lie before the view, i.e. to be present, to stand forth.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Strong (originally and generally of physical strength); mighty, powerful, vehement, sure. From ischus; forcible.
